content.rendered:
Gottwals Books Featured in Publishers Weekly

This article kicks off our 10-Year Anniversary month! We will soon announce a 10-day lineup of events for the month of March. It all starts with a ribbon cutting on 3/21. Between the ribbon cutting and the end of the month, we will give away books, gift cards, and special commemorative items! Oh, and lest we forget, we will have our biggest sale EVER. But first, read this article!

http://www.publishersweekly.com/pw/by-topic/industry-news/bookselling/article/72956-gottwals-books-turns-10-adds-15th-store.html

 

New Inventory

We have tons of hot titles hitting our shelves this week. Here is a sneak peek from the warehouse!

 

Event Recap

We had a lot of fun celebrating Dr. Seuss Day at Chick-fil-A® last week! Abbey Gottwals read Dr. Seuss favorites including There’s a Wocket in My Pocket and The Cat in the Hat. Keep an eye out for more events, especially Kids’ Corner story time in the summer!

 

Ladies’ Night Out

There is still time to get tickets for Middle Georgia’s 12th annual Ladies’ Night Out! This event benefits the pro-life adoption ministry Covenant Care Adoption Services.

The event will feature Babbie Mason who is a performer, speaker, and author. The event is Thursday, March 23rd, at 7:00 p.m. Visit their website (link below) for more information.

You can pick up your tickets at any Gottwals Books location.

https://www.covenantcareadoptions.com/event/ladies-night-babbie-mason/
